name: Avocado Cucumber Pasta Salad
author: Stephanie
summary: This is the best pasta salad I have had. A friend at work gave me the recipe and I always get compliments whenever I make it.
ingredients: ½ cup Italian dressing, or more to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain and let cool, 10 to 15 minutes
Mix rotini pasta, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, Italian dressing, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl
Chill until flavors combine, about 1 hour
Toss avocado with lemon juice in a bowl
Mix into the pasta salad before serving
